text: James Pazhayattil (26 July 1934 - 10 July 2016)Catholic Hierarchy entry was the Syro-Malabar Catholic hierarch, Bishop of Irinjalakuda, India. Ordained to the priesthood in 1961, Pazhayattil served as bishop of Irinjalakuda from 1978 to 2010.Diocese of Irinjalakuda ==Notes== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Syro-Malabar bishops
title: James Pazhayattil
